title: vel w a projectile?
body: what exactly is a projectile for the purposes of the yasuo windwall? there are so many abilities that just shoudnt count in my opinion

replies.body: Pretty much anything that travels. Vel W and Taliyah R both have to travel and therefore count as projectiles. Lux R and Vel R do not travel and therefore do not.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=EURax7BE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-08T12:58:43.083+0000)
>
> Pretty much anything that travels. Vel W and Taliyah R both have to travel and therefore count as projectiles. Lux R and Vel R do not travel and therefore do not.

that's silly af

Projectile: a body projected or impelled forward, as through the air.

So basically, anything that has to travel.
Also, vel w is a knockup aoe on the ground but get windwalled if windwall is between it and the targeted area
It has to travel though, if you watch the particle it has two swirlys that travel then explode. Lulu's poly is the same deal.

Taliyah R...

That one makes me laugh more than anything xD
